resources.string: 1. Pick a photo from your gallery for your comic. \n 2. Annotate the photo with a speech- or thought bubble.
Start the Automics Alton Towers Experience. Once this is running, press the \'home\' button at the bottom of the screen.
Maybe you can convince one of you to climb into a seat? Take a photo of them.
Having refreshments near Oblivion? Why not use the time to choose three panels for your Automic?
Dare to ride Oblivion? Why not use this queuing time to select a photo for your Automic and put comments on it if you like?
Are you queuing? Why not use the queuing time to select a photo for your Automic and put comments on it if you like?
Time for a break. Why not use the time to choose three panels for your Automic?
Do you see anything fun to take a picture of? Maybe with some of you on it?
You made it! Did you enjoy the spinning fun? Why not take a photo of yourself to prove your braveness.
That\'s what falling must be like. Why not take a picture to show you survived!?
Would you like to try that drop? Maybe you can capture a photo of yourself in front of it?
Time for a break near Sonic? Why not use the time to choose three panels for your Automic?
Do you see a friendly hedgehog that wants to be on a photo with you?
Daring the Sonic ride? Why not use the queuing time to select a photo for your Automic and put comments on it if you like?
Hi there! Hope you\'re enjoying your day at Alton Towers.
Crop images for your Automic. Add speech bubbles and comments if you like.
If you want to take a photo, press the button below.
Been on Sonic, Oblivion or Battle Galleons? Choose three photos for your Automic.
How appropriate was the timing of this notification?
